title: Seriously... Diana Skin.
body:
When will you give Diana a skin? She did not get a skin at all last year and yet others get 2 in a year (Lunar revel jinx/Zombie slayer). 

"But she's gonna get her skin later this year for all stars."** Imagine if Nautilus or Teemo won the votes? You think she'll get a skin? 
**
I'm pretty sure Rito knows how much people want blood moon skin for Diana, and yet they continue to make it for other champions, Kennen and Yasuo being an example (I don't mind Kennen at all, she needs skin too). it's like we're being completely ignored in this matter. 

Don't get me wrong, I'm not hating. At the end of the day I just want Rito to give Diana love just like how we love her, and maybe one day, just one day... we'll get Diana's very own Blood Moon Skin.

P.S. Pardon my grammatical errors.

{{champion:131}}

replies.body: I thought she was supposed to get the team fire/ice skin from that poll
Yup! She still is, it's coming a bit later this year.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=M8V8ppN6,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-02-10T17:12:52.749+0000)
>
> Yup! She still is, it's coming a bit later this year.

But this skin doesn't count as her potential yearly skin slot, given that it's a "bonus skin" much like the SKT skins, right?

This technically isn't an esports skin, as it's just going to be a cool fire-themed skin that players helped decide upon. I don't think this falls into the same category as something like SKT or Fnatic.
It's for the All Star Event, the theme (fire or ice) depended on who won the All Star Event, and it doesn't count as an esports skin?  Don't understand Riot's logic here.
Correct, but it's not associated with a team, like Sukishoo said. It's a fire-themed skin, not her dressed up in esports gear.

Well, if that is the case, then there was no real reason to tie it to an esports event to begin with as the esports event is not being tied to the skin.  Riot seems to be overly technical here in whether something is an esports skin or not.  Won't get it myself.  Thank you for the reply, Katey.

We wanted to involve players more in the skins process, which is why we did something to let players vote on a champion who they'd like to see a fire or an ice skin. The decision of the fire/ice skin was the only part that was tied to esports. 

If we decked her out in team gear, or added a team logo to it, she'd definitely be an esports skin, but that's not the case here - she's just going to have a sweet fire theme.
Just out of curiosity how long on average is the development cycle for a champion skin? I know it's probably a difficult question to answer but a general window would be nice.
It varies depending on what the skin has going into it. 3-5 weeks is an average ball park range.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=M8V8ppN6,comment-id=000000010000000100000000,timestamp=2016-02-10T19:20:21.194+0000)
>
> Correct, but it's not associated with a team, like Sukishoo said. It's a fire-themed skin, not her dressed up in esports gear.

I'm going to go with this; the skin will be something akin to a Solari Diana skin, something fans have been clamoring for since forever. It ties in with the new Targon champs lore changes/updates (possible event upcoming, it's been a while since the harrowing now.) and could possibly be accompanied by a Lunari skin for Leona. And, if we're lucky, the Baker Pantheon skin we've all been waiting for since his release.
Are you going to make this a Legacy skin?  I hope not with how few she has.
Hasn't been decided yet. I would personally guess no, but it'll be announced when the skin comes out.
Can we hope that she will wear a good looking armor instead of a dress like Lunari? That's my main concern, to be honest.
Well it doesn't really belong to a "team" like those do, so I'd think it's just a regular skin as it is supposed to be a Fire theme much like Zyra, Wukong, ect have fire based skins.

Base on other things she has said this may be her only skin for the year, just because people voted for it doesn't not make it a "bonus" skin at the very least this seems to be the only skin for her in the pipe at the moment
She is but its not gonna be available till mid year. all i was saying is imagine if it wasnt her who won that poll?
Then she would have probably got a different skin,it just would have taken a bit longer since they would need to come up with a theme for said skin.

Blood Moon Yasuo/Kennen over Blood Moon Diana? im so confused, you had a perfect chance to create a skin that was MADE for her when the Zilean skin was made a while back, and still do this day she doesnt have a Blood Moon skin after these 2?
soon solo q will be filled with filthy diana mains
I get that you main Diana and you want a new skin, but other champions haven't gotten skins in longer periods of time. I don't' think she needs a new skin at all.
The champions are way too many there's really no point in asking skins for a specific champion  its almost impossible to calculate these things with so many characters
Blood moon is too on the nose imo, she has lunar godess as is, she doesnt need a third skin relating to the moon (I count classic in this as well)

She doesn't need a skin she already has some nice ones with different particles from the original one the one who needs a new skin is {{champion:14}} been over a year since his Rework and he still hasn't gotten one.
